long_description: Protect your little one from the cold with the protective Thule Chariot Stroller Bunting Bag when you head out with your Chariot stroller. Children up to age 2 will benefit from this insulating fleece-lined bunting bag with adjustable hood. The easy-to-clean Thule Chariot Stroller Bunting Bag is compatible with all 5-point harness systems found in Thule Chariot strollers (strollers sold separately).
short_description: Protect your little one from the cold with the protective Thule Chariot Stroller Bunting Bag when you head out with your Chariot stroller.
